TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlConditions extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示必須在評量 SAML 判斷提示之有效性時加以考量的一組條件。

span.span: Represents a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示以及必須在評量 SAML 判斷提示之有效性時加以考量的一組條件，指定其宣告。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion. 類別表示條件的集合。The class represents the set of conditions. 其中一個條件範例為是否不得快取 SAML 判斷提示，此條件是用 類別來表示。An example of a condition is whether the SAML assertion must not be cached, which is represented by the class. SAML 規格會定義兩個條件，並且允許擴充條件集合。The SAML specification defines two conditions and it allows for the set of conditions to be extended. 由 SAML 規格定義的兩個條件是 以及 。The two conditions defined by the SAML specification are and . 若要定義新的條件，請從 類別衍生一個類別。To define a new condition, derive a class from the class.
